mapper.select: SELECT F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(d.SUN_YMD,'Y-M-D') AS SUN_YMD , d.DAY_NM , d.NOTE , F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(d.MOON_YMD,'Y-M-D') AS MOON_YMD , F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(h.HOLIDAY_YMD,'Y-M-D') AS HOLIDAY_YMD , h.HOLIDAY_NM FROM WTM_DAY_MGR d JOIN WTM_HOLIDAY_MGR h ON 'Y' = ( CASE WHEN h.SUN_YN = 'Y' AND d.SUN_YMD = h.HOLIDAY_YMD THEN 'Y' WHEN h.SUN_YN = 'N' AND d.MOON_YMD = h.HOLIDAY_YMD THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ) WHERE (h.TENANT_ID IS NULL OR h.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId}) AND (#{enterCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} IS NULL OR h.ENTER_CD IS NULL OR h.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND (#{bisinessPlaceCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} IS NULL OR h.BISINESS_PLACE_CD IS NULL OR h.BISINESS_PLACE_CD = #{bisinessPlaceCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND SUBSTR(SUN_YMD,1,6) = #{ym} ORDER BY d.SUN_YMD
select info_key , info_name , info_data from comm_management_infomation where tenant_id = #{tenantId}

SELECT A.YMD as YMD, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.YMD, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY.MM.DD') as YMDS, F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(A.ENTRY_SDATE, 'YMDHI') as ENTRY_SDATE, NVL(F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(A.ENTRY_SDATE, 'Y.M.D H:I'), '') || ' ~ ' || NVL(F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(A.ENTRY_EDATE, 'Y.M.D H:I'), '') as ENTRY_DATE, A.ENTRY_STYPE_CD as ENTRY_STYPE_CD, F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(A.ENTRY_EDATE, 'YMDHI') as ENTRY_EDATE, A.ENTRY_ETYPE_CD as ENTRY_ETYPE_CD, F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(MIN(B.PLAN_SDATE), 'YMDHI') as PLAN_SDATE, NVL(F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(MIN(B.PLAN_SDATE), 'Y.M.D H:I'), '') || ' ~ ' || NVL(F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(MAX(B.PLAN_EDATE), 'Y.M.D H:I'), '') as PLAN_DATE, F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(MAX(B.PLAN_EDATE), 'YMDHI') as PLAN_EDATE, F_WTM_GET_FLEXIBLE_NM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.SABUN, A.YMD) as FLEXIBLE_NM, F_WTM_GET_TIME_NM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.SABUN, A.YMD) as TIME_NM FROM WTM_WORK_CALENDAR A LEFT OUTER JOIN WTM_WORK_DAY_RESULT B ON A.YMD = B.YMD AND A.TENANT_ID = B.TENANT_ID AND A.ENTER_CD = B.ENTER_CD AND A.SABUN = B.SABUN WHERE A.YMD = #{ymd} AND A.SABUN = #{sabun} AND A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} GROUP BY A.YMD, A.ENTRY_SDATE, A.ENTRY_EDATE, ENTRY_STYPE_CD, ENTRY_ETYPE_CD, A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.SABUN, B.PLAN_SDATE, B.PLAN_EDATE

SELECT A.YMD, F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(A.ENTRY_SDATE, 'YMDHI') as ENTRY_SDATE, A.ENTRY_STYPE_CD, F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(A.ENTRY_EDATE, 'YMDHI') as ENTRY_EDATE, A.ENTRY_ETYPE_CD, F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(MIN(B.PLAN_SDATE), 'YMDHI') as PLAN_SDATE, F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(MAX(B.PLAN_EDATE), 'YMDHI') as PLAN_EDATE, F_WTM_GET_FLEXIBLE_NM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.SABUN, A.YMD) as FLEXIBLE_NM, F_WTM_GET_TIME_NM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.SABUN, A.YMD) as TIME_NM FROM WTM_WORK_CALENDAR A LEFT OUTER JOIN WTM_WORK_DAY_RESULT B ON A.YMD = B.YMD AND A.TENANT_ID = B.TENANT_ID AND A.ENTER_CD = B.ENTER_CD AND A.SABUN = B.SABUN WHERE A.YMD = #{ymd} AND A.SABUN = #{sabun} AND A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} GROUP BY A.YMD

SELECT A.TENANT_ID as tenantId, A.ENTER_CD as enterCd, A.YMD as ymd, A.SABUN as sabun, A.TIME_TYPE_CD as timeTypeCd, A.TAA_CD as taaCd, A.PLAN_SDATE as planSdate, A.PLAN_EDATE as planEdate FROM WTM_WORK_DAY_RESULT A INNER JOIN WTM_WORK_CALENDAR B ON A.YMD = B.YMD AND A.TENANT_ID = B.TENANT_ID AND A.ENTER_CD = B.ENTER_CD AND A.SABUN = B.SABUN WHERE A.YMD = #{stdYmd} AND A.SABUN = #{sabun} AND A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd}
